name: Mlombia Lesareyo
message: Thanks to Wajibu, we mobilized over 3,000 signatures for a public safety petition in Kisumu. It got the County Assembly's attention!

name: Brian Otieno
message: I reported ghost projects in our county and the government tracker gave me solid data to support my claims in a townhall meeting.

name: Anne Nyamuiru
message: Wajibu's civic education section helped me teach my local youth group how to hold leaders accountable legally and peacefully.

name: Fatma Hussein
message: After sharing a verified corruption case in the forum, local journalists picked it up. Wajibu gave us a voice.
